content: Reptyl and Primo were informed by an unknown agent that going into the Rot was suicide. The Avengers also noticed the hole, which was growing in space. Mantis and Vision consulted Eternity for any help that he could provide against the cancer in space, but he revealed that he had no affect over the Rot. Mentor, Starfox, and several Eternals of Saturn were consumed by the Rot as they pursued their assailants into its dark grasp.
identity: Unknown to the universe as a whole.
origin: Death revealed that Rot was conceived by her and Thanos (Avengers: Celestial Quest#5 2002)
